short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a survey with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy-to-use and time-saving option to create surveys in one click. 

Short Description: - 

Introducing “One-Click Survey” - Get your survey created with just one click and save your valuable time.  

Install the surveyed extension from google store. Once installation is done, an option appears in the context menu. Now select the questions of your choice, right-click on it and select 'Add to list'. 

Then a popup will open with the selected questions and a preview of them, next click on 'Create a survey’, it will redirect you to survey details page of Surveyed website with all your selected questions. 

You can further specify the answer category and save it. A survey will be created which you can share anywhere.  

With our advanced features, you can receive audio, video and text feedback, as well as AI-driven analysis which can assist you on your way to success. 

Detailed Steps: - 

Install surveyed extension from chrome store. Once installation is done, an option appears in the context menu. Now select the questions of your choice, right-click on it and select 'Add to list'. Then a popup will open with the selected questions and a preview of them, next click on 'Create a survey’, it will redirect you to survey details page of Surveyed website with all your selected questions. 

 
To add more questions from the same web page, click on ‘minimize’ button on the top right side of the popup, select the text and repeat the above step.  

 
Once the survey questions selection is done, click on ‘create a survey’ button on the right-side bottom of popup menu and it will redirect you to surveyed registration page, click register, that's it! By default, a free account will be auto created which you can upgrade later. Once registration is done, you can find survey page ready with your questionnaire. Save it and share it on any platform as per your requirement. 

 
With our advanced features, you can receive the responses through various categories such as audio, video, text, A/B etc. 

 
We provide AI-driven analysis such as Sentiment Analysis, Word Cloud, CX scores, Survey analytics etc, for your received responses which can assist you on your way to success. 

 
Note: If you already have an account, it will take you to survey creation page directly. 

For more details about how to use extension, please visit - https://surveyed.live/extension

For more details about Surveyed, please visit - https://surveyed.live

For more details about our products, please visit - https://spicyfy.io/
